body_html: Thanks for the details. Your methodology looks good. You are running on the CPU, yes? TensorFlow uses Eigen for CPU convolutions and cuDNN for GPU convolutions. It's quite possible that the implementation used for 1,1,3,64 convolution is not as efficient as the larger one, hence your observation. Can you try it on as GPU?

body: Thanks for the details. Your methodology looks good. You are running on the CPU, yes? TensorFlow uses Eigen for CPU convolutions and cuDNN for GPU convolutions. It's quite possible that the implementation used for 1,1,3,64 convolution is not as efficient as the larger one, hence your observation. Can you try it on as GPU?
